column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Stop the presses
column2: this is it!  If you are looking for the perfect breakfast in Chicago
column3: where  serving sizes are a plus
column5: I think I gained 5 pounds just reading the menu. Nevertheless
column6: I pulled back my fork and dove into the best omelette I have eaten in a long while
column7: the Fresca. My girlfriend enjoyed the Berry Bliss Pancakes
column8: while we didn't finish everything it wasn't because we didn't try. The food is INCREDIBLE
column9: trust me you will not want to have breakfast anywhere else after one dining experience.
